(Simplified: 玑)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 幾 indicates the sound; 王 (jade) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 王 [ wáng ] king, ruler; royal; surname
    • 幾 [ jǐ ] small table; how many; a few, some
①不圓的珠子：珠璣。
②古代測天文的儀器：璇璣。
③北斗星名之一。

Original meaning 本义: Meaning pearl that is not quite round.

English senses 英语理解:

璣字的基本解释

璣
jī
见“玑”。

璣字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jī］
［《廣韻》居依切，平微，見。］
“玑1”的繁体字。
(1)不圆的珠。一说小珠。
(2)古代观测天象的仪器中可旋转的部分。饰以玉石。
(3)北斗的第三星。

璣字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【玉字部】　璣； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页742第17
【唐韻】居衣切【集韻】【韻會】居希切，?音機。【說文】珠不圓者。【書·禹貢】厥篚?纁璣組。【傳】璣，珠類，生于水。【釋文】璣，珠不圓也。字書云：小珠也。【前漢·景十三王傳】遣建荃葛珠璣。【註】師古曰：璣，珠之不圓者。　又鏡名。【說文徐註】按符瑞圖有璣鏡。註：大珠而琕，有光曜，可爲鏡。　又器名。【書·舜典】在璿璣玉衡，以齊七政。【註】在，察也。璣，正天文之器，璣爲轉運，衡爲橫簫，運璣使動。璣徑八尺，圓周二尺五寸而强。衡長八尺，孔徑一寸，下端望之，以占星辰吉凶之象。七政者，日月五星也。得失由政，故稱政焉。　又星名。【史記·天官書北斗七星註】春秋運斗極云：斗第三璣。　又【集韻】渠希切，音祈。又【集韻】【韻會】其旣切【正韻】吉器切，?音禨。又【集韻】巨至切，音?。義?同。

Ji
Basic explanation of words
Ji
jī
See "Ji".
Ji
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jī］
["Guangyun" Ju Yiqie, Ping Wei, see. ]
"玑1" in traditional characters.
(1) Beads that are not round. Let’s talk about beads.
(2) The rotatable part of the ancient instruments for observing astronomical phenomena. Decorated with jade.
(3) The third star of Beidou.
Ji
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Won Collection 1] [Jade Character Department] 　玑; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Pages: 742-17
[Tang Yun] Juyiqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Juxiqie, sound machine. [Speaking text] The beads are not round. [Book·Yugong] Jue Zhuo? Hao Ji Group. [Biography] Ji, bead, born in water. 【Explanation】Ji, the beads are not round. Word book goes: Xiaozhu also. [Previous Han·Jing Thirteen Kings] Dispatched to build Quan Ge Zhuji. [Note] Shi Gu said: Ji, the one who does not round the beads.　Again the name of the mirror. [Said Wenxu Note] According to Fu Ruitu, there is a Jiejing mirror. Note: The big bead and the 琕 have a light beam, which can be a mirror.　Also name. [Book·Shun Dian] In Jingzhang Yuheng, Qi Qizheng is used. [Note] Yes, Chaye. Ji is the instrument of astronomy, Ji is the transshipment, the balance is the horizontal flute, and the movement is the movement. Ji has a diameter of eight feet and a circumference of two feet and five inches. The scale is eight feet long and the hole diameter is one inch. Seven political persons, the sun, the moon and the five stars are also. Gains and losses are governed by politics, so it is called politics.　Also star name. [Historical Records·The Book of Heavenly Official Book of the Big Dipper] The Spring and Autumn Movement Dou Jiyun: The Third Ji of Dou Ji.　[Jiyun] Qu Xiqie, sound prayer. Also 【Ji Yun】【Rhyme Meeting】It's Qiqi cut 【Zheng Yun】 Jiqiqi cut,? Yinxun. Also 【Jiyun】Great to cut, sound?. Righteous? Same.
